soon as he chose to be commissioned them
sent them out and he said heal the sick
cleanse the lepers cast out demons raise

the demons are subject to us in your

why how did the church get so far off of

because that's what the disciples did in

well there are some practical reasons

me I'm the one who's doing it but if you

you don't really know if it was you or

kind of splits up the responsibility and
